text: Futhiukuzeazilaboabangabazenzisi, kwabesekuthiwakubona, “wozani, nilwe endleleni kaMvelinqangi noma nizivikele” bathi, “ukube besisazi ukuthi kuzoliwa besizonilandela” bona kwakuseduzane kakhulu kubona ukungakholwa kunokukholwa ngalelolanga futhi uMvelinqangi uyakwazi kangcono lokho abakufihlayo
